attributes.action: Require MP's to provide receipts in support of all expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ordinary people are required by their employers to provide receipts to support expense claims. HM Revenue & Customs also require evidence to support claims. Similar rules should apply to MP's and public servants.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
